text: @betsy_klein The money should be spent for protecting healthcare workers who are still at risk from #coronavirus , wtf  #FakePresident . If #Trump is a good moraled president and a courageous one, he wouldn't be scared to speak with people or reach out like #BarackObama did. #SayTheirNames

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
